htmlBody: Also possibly of interest: <https://forum.effectivealtruism.org/posts/nqJDGjccGLDKdGnXE/social-impact-of-the-donations-of-the-10-richest-people-in>, <https://forum.effectivealtruism.org/posts/wahhPpkKnCoGSMZzq/the-billionaires-philanthropy-index>. Particularly the second; you might be able to tweak it to achieve what you propose.

90% or 99%

The giving pledge is 50%+, so I'd include 50%
